text_block_list.text:
Heavy rains were forecast to last all through the night. 
Having finished my tasks, I was about to head back 
to the academy when ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Tell me, can you see this earth's most luminous light!?
—— I heard a familiar voice in my vicinity.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This is a horsegirl's light, one destined to become The Era's 
High King!! My dear luminescent peer shining down upon 
the world, allow yourself to revel at its resplendent glow!!

T.M. Opera O stood on the riverbank, sounding even more 
buoyant than usual.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why, if it isn't my dear trainer. Can you not tell? 
I'm competing with the first star of the evening, of course.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Our duel of aesthetic is much like running with a partner. 
Having someone to compete with is what allows us to reach 
our highest potentials.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hence why day after day I steadily put in 
the effort, finding time and a partner.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I'd say it's high time we return to our match, my twinkling friend! 
I am here for you! Reveal to me your most exquisite radiance!
A moment after T.M. Opera O struck another pose…
(glintn't……)
… a rain cloud moved itself between her and her starry partner.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Phew, our great battle will remain in all of our memories. 
Trainer, my dear, please applaud my stellar opponent.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It has indeed. Yours truly stands victorious. You saw as well 
as I, didn't you? That moment when our shining celestial gem 
bashfully withdrew its own brilliance before my charms!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In other words, my charm has reached a height that causes 
even the stars to grow timid. Perhaps my next sparring partner 
ought to be the moon… no, the sun!

… The moon would not be gracing the sky for a while 
and if anything, the forecast predicted a rainy night.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, are there no worthy rivals left for me? 
My dear trainer, have you knowledge of any?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, I understand it's a difficult question. For the only one 
who can match yours truly is of course, myself.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Alas, it is the way of the world. I will let the night winds 
soothe my solitude as I search for my next rival.
…… She does actually come across somewhat lonely.

Is there nothing I can do as her trainer? She mentioned 
only she could match herself… then perhaps ——
choice_data_list: You could try competing with yourself…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Whaaat!? Compete with myself!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, what audacious ideas you dream up, my dear trainer! 
Indeed it is darkest under the lantern. Yours truly cannot 
know her own radiance!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: How wondrous a thought! Let us give it a go at once!

… Thus it was that on our next day off, T.M. Opera O 
requested my presence at the dance studio.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! My dear trainer, observe as, even up against herself, yours truly soars to an effortless victory.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You have the best seat to watch my elegance unfold. 
We commence… with a showdown of poses!

A competition of aesthetic began, between T.M. Opera O 
and her mirror image ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: …… Haah…… haah. I can't believe it. Never before have I ran into a horsegirl as tough and handsome.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
How can she strike my very own poses, with the exact 
timing, at the same pace!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Please answer me, my dear reflection!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
…… I am certain she must think the very same way 
as yours truly. So be it, I never held the expectation 
to finish this in one round regardless!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: On to the next round! That's right, the staring contest!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: …… Heheheh, haa-ha-ha-ha!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You can't be serious! How could I be expected to resist 
a smile when faced with such a handsome visage!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Dear me, you have held me to another draw…… 
You pack quite the punch, my dear optical echo!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Nonetheless, the prelude to your defeat has begun! 
I'll put an end to this with a game of Red Light, Green Light!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Reeeeeeed light!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
How handsome of a horsegirl I see before me! 
Would you tell me your name…!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear! Knowing that a touch means defeat, why oh why 
do I extend my hand by my own volition!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
…… My defeat is certain and complete, my dear trainer. 
I could not stand up to the charms of my mirror self.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, how wicked… how heartrending! 
It hurts me so, to see this sinful beauty in the mirror! 
Never have I encountered this feeling before!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But it does not become yours truly to merely bemoan the facts. 
I will conquer myself one day, for that is what makes a high king!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aaah! How exquisite!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: …… Gah, I had no idea my reflection would be so gorgeous. Ah, however will I overcome this barrier, how many years of dedication will it take……

T.M. Opera O laid motionless where she had flopped down. 
From the looks of it, she is taking the loss to herself harshly.
choice_data_list: …… You can do it, Opera O
…… You can do it, Opera O

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Definitely. My dictionary does not include "losing streak". 
Next time, I will undoubtedly know the glory of victory.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I must say however, my dear trainer, you are truly astonishing. 
At this moment I hold nothing but the highest respect for you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why, you have been able to lay your eye on yours truly 
in all her magnificence and splendor this whole time.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Unquestionably, your will is that of steel, worthy of reverence. 
Truth be told, I can scarcely believe it.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Is that resolute self-restraint the pinnacle 
I must reach to conquer my own self…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Still, I must reiterate how gorgeous of an image 
fills my eyes… It is you who will be my life-long 
rival, my dear specular counterpart…!
T.M. Opera O may just have found her toughest rival yet……
